thread.title: Google promises a Hadoop or Spark cluster in 90 seconds with Cloud Dataproc - PC World
thread.title_full: Google promises a Hadoop or Spark cluster in 90 seconds with Cloud Dataproc - PC World - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: PC World
title: Google promises a Hadoop or Spark cluster in 90 seconds with Cloud Dataproc - PC World
text:
Getting insights out of big data is typically neither quick nor easy, but Google is aiming to change all that with a new, managed service for Hadoop and Spark. Cloud Dataproc, which the search giant launched into open beta on Wednesday, is a new piece of its big data portfolio that's designed to help companies create clusters quickly, manage them easily and turn them off when they're not needed.
 PC World.
